name: SERAPH
tag_list: threat-assessment-and-resolution, stalking, personal-protection, litigation-support, information-collection-and-research, travel-safety, employee-theft, absenteeism-and-aggression, investigations, security-training, workplace-violence, emergency-planning,
overview:
SERAPH.net offers corporations, school, colleges, hospitals, government agencies, law firms, and individuals a vast array of programs to solve problems.

Problem solving: Threat assessment and resolution, stalking, personal protection, litigation support, information collection and research, domestically and internationally.

Problem solving: employee theft, absenteeism and aggression, accident investigations, security team training, workplace violence, emergency planning and stress management.
